file_content.text: Nothing more for you today.
Smells like a sweaty farmer. Great spot for a dead drop.
This is the place, yes? We were expecting something... fancier.
Good droids, many droids. You coming to shop now, yes? You look around.
I'm not in the market for droids, but I've got holocams to sell.
I need something else.
You're Datto Wys, right? What kind of shop is this?
What's your business?
What? Is droid shop--old droids, junk droids, made new again.
You want broken droids, speak to Jawas. You want good droids, come here!
I heard you were interested in holocams.
I have something for you.
An associate of mine asked me to drop off these holocams. Does that mean anything?
I was told to meet you.
Look, we both know why I'm here. Take the holocams and give me what I want.
Let's get this over with.
I've got your stupid holocams. Now tell me what's going on.
No games, merchant.
Holocams? Yes... yes. For these, we make an exchange. I get holocams, you get shiny mouse droid. Good condition.
Thank you. I'm... sure that'll do nicely.
All right.
Sorry--I don't want a droid. I brought you holocams....
There must be some mistake.
And I give you mouse droid. It comes this morning, yes? With credits and instructions: "Give in exchange for holocams."
I don't want a droid. Who put you up to this?
What're you playing at?
No. No! Please--mouse droid comes this morning, yes? With credits and instructions: "Give in exchange for holocams."
This is all I know. I do not ask questions when strange droids come with money. So you take it.
Thank you.
If I must.
Yes yes yes. Look! Look! Your droid is getting away. Better follow him.
Don't try to trick me.
I only follow instructions! No trouble, you see? No--ah.
Your, ah, mouse droid seems to wander away. Maybe follow? Maybe?
On Hutta, we used mouse droids for target practice.
Let's be ready to meet our source, shall we?
Mouse droids, good droids! All new, all cheap....
